official_title: To amend section 5948 of title 5, United States Code, to reauthorize physicians comparability allowances.

summary.text: Extends the physicians' comparability allowance program through September 30, 1993. Prohibits any service under such program from extending beyond September 30, 1995.

titles.title: To amend section 5948 of title 5, United States Code, to reauthorize physicians comparability allowances.
